items.content_html: This repository contains a simple web application built with Hono, a lightweight web framework for the Edge runtime, Deno, Bun, and Node.js. The app demonstrates basic routing, query parameters, and JSON responses.

items.content_html: ua-parser-k8s is a lightweight, Kubernetes-native microservice that provides User-Agent parsing as an API. It utilizes the popular ua-parser-js library to analyze User-Agent strings and extract device, browser, and OS information efficiently.

items.content_html: This project is a cost-effective and lightweight Task and Project Management System designed to store project and task details in a database and display them on a user-friendly webpage. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it prioritizes simplicity, accessibility, and minimal resource consumption. This approach makes it ideal for applications
